thread.title: TOWIE's Kate Wright vows she'll NEVER have romance on TV again, amid Rio Ferdinand 'dating' rumours
thread.title_full: TOWIE's Kate Wright vows she'll NEVER have romance on TV again, amid Rio Ferdinand 'dating' rumours

author: Lara Martin
title: TOWIE's Kate Wright vows she'll NEVER have romance on TV again, amid Rio Ferdinand 'dating' rumours
text:
TV TOWIE's Kate Wright vows she'll NEVER have romance on TV again, amid Rio Ferdinand 'dating' rumours The blonde star has not confirmed or denied swirling rumours she's been on a few dates with ex footballer Rio Ferdinand Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now TOWIE is back and heading to Tenerife Share this video Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing! Could   
Kate Wright has yet to address those ongoing rumours she’s been dating former footballer Rio Ferdinand but she’s said one thing is VERY clear when it comes to her love life: no more boyfriends on TV. 
The TOWIE star has vowed she’ll never have an onscreen relationship again after her messy split with co-star Dan Edgar was played out in public last year. 
“Never ever again,” she said. 
“Too much stress, too much pressure. Everyone’s in each other’s business. You can’t breathe. You might have a row about ketchup and it turns into a crazy thing.” Kate looks stunning in her TOWIE series 20 publicity photo (Photo: ITV Picture Desk) Kate's ex Dan pictured filming in Tenerife (Photo: Rex Features) Read More TOWIE's James Lock reveals truth behind Kate Wright's relationship with Rio Ferdinand 
“I want to stay out of a relationship [on the show],” she added. 
Kate and Dan dated for four years before Dan was cast on TOWIE in 2015; she accused him of splitting from her so he could appear on the show. 
She then joined him onscreen and they slowly rebuilt their connection and rekindled their romance, before splitting last year. 
It’s since been rumoured that she’s been on a few dates with ex England and Manchester United star Rio , but neither has confirmed or denied the claims. Kate has been linked to Rio (Photo: Getty Images Europe) Kate is keeping coy about her love life (Photo: Lia Toby/WENN.com) Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
